text:
Are you saying that you can just run the PowerShell script at this link and it
handles the whole installation process including partition resizing? 
https://support.microsoft.com/en-us/topic/kb5034957-updating-the-winre-partition-on-deployed-devices-to-address-security-vulnerabilities-in-cve-2024-20666-0190331b-1ca3-42d8-8a55-7fc406910c10
 
Thanks 
Jeff Brown 
Principal Systems Engineer
%40LV2PR19MB5813.namprd19.prod.outlook.com

metadata.subject: RE: [patchmanagement] You may hit a 0x80070643 - ERROR_INSTALL_FAILURE
